Retina type 3 cone bipolar cell.Title: Immunocytochemical identification of cone bipolar cells in the rat retina
Retina type 3 cone bipolar cell.EditorialNote: Pub Med ID was incorrect in spreadsheet;  check with Mihail to make sure article correct
Retina type 3 cone bipolar cell.Definition: Type 2 and type 3 CBs have similar (with type 1 CB) dendritic tree shapes but show diffuse stratification at different levels of the outer half of the IPL, that is in strata 1 to 2 and 2, respectively. ...the axon terminal of type 3 shows a  and quot;well to arranged and quot; treelike branching pattern.
